sentence: Besides Kemp and Perdue, the primary includes Republicans Catherine Davis, Kandiss Taylor and Tom Williams, who were excluded from Sunday's debate.

title: Georgia's Kemp and Perdue clash over elections in debate

sentence: Candidates Catherine Davis and Tom Williams each had 1 percent while 8 percent of GOP voters marked "undecided."

sentence: First-time debaters included Kandiss Taylor, an educator; Catherine Davis, a civil rights advocate; and Tom Williams, a former Robins Air Force Base employee.
title: Ohio Republicans campaign in Trump's shadow ahead of Tuesday's primary.
